name: Paper Nowhere
description:
An exploration game set in the world of Floraverse

Play as Doodle, a little mole living in the small, isolated city of Last Frail, where he spends his days looking for anything to distract him from the emptiness of life. This changes when he suddenly remembers the location of the place where he was born and raised. With this destination in mind, he wanders off to the darkest corners of Last Frail...

The game is still far from finished, but you can still download and play whatever has been made so far.
